title: Looking forward to offical TPU-version BigGAN code~
body:
Hi ajbrock,
      Thanks for open-source BigGAN code, which benefits a lot on other explore of BigGAN. But considering the cost of time, we hope to train biggan on TPU, so we use a version of tensorflow code that looks close to yours(**https://github.com/Octavian-ai/BigGAN-TPU-TensorFlow**). But many of the attempts turned out to be bad. Can you continue to release the official biggan code of TPU version?

Sincerely

config:
Imagenet2012
tf-1.12.2
GCP v3-8 pod
training for up to 300k steps

Some failed results:
100k:
![100k samples](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41911374/67184786-17aab780-f417-11e9-819e-4426d4f19cd0.png)
180k:
![180k samples](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41911374/67184797-1d080200-f417-11e9-98e6-21195a01c2c4.png)
300k:
![300k samples](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41911374/67184803-2002f280-f417-11e9-93e4-0dea2fbe2ec1.png)
